title: USA Alcohol and Drug-Related Deaths (1990–2019)
description: Focuses on alcohol- and drug-attributable deaths in the United States from 1990 to 2019. All cards and charts should be filtered to location_name in ['United States', 'United States of America'] and year between 1990 and 2019, inclusive.

cards.title: Total Alcohol-Related Deaths (1990–2019, USA)
cards.value_expression: df.loc[df['location_name'].isin(['United States','United States of America']) & df['year'].between(1990, 2019), 'alc_deaths'].sum()
cards.description: Sum of alcohol-attributable deaths in the USA across all ages and sexes from 1990 to 2019.

cards.title: Total Drug-Related Deaths (1990–2019, USA)
cards.value_expression: df.loc[df['location_name'].isin(['United States','United States of America']) & df['year'].between(1990, 2019), 'drugs_deaths'].sum()
cards.description: Sum of drug-attributable deaths in the USA across all ages and sexes from 1990 to 2019.

cards.title: Alcohol Share of Alcohol + Drug Deaths
cards.value_expression: (df.loc[df['location_name'].isin(['United States','United States of America']) & df['year'].between(1990, 2019), 'alc_deaths'].sum()) / ((df.loc[df['location_name'].isin(['United States','United States of America']) & df['year'].between(1990, 2019), 'alc_deaths'].sum()) + (df.loc[df['location_name'].isin(['United States','United States of America']) & df['year'].between(1990, 2019), 'drugs_deaths'].sum()))
cards.description: Percentage of combined alcohol and drug deaths attributable to alcohol in the USA over 1990–2019.

charts.title: Annual Alcohol-Related Deaths by Sex (USA, 1990–2019)
charts.description: Trend of alcohol-attributable deaths over time, grouped by sex. Filter to USA and years 1990–2019; aggregated across all ages.

charts.title: Annual Drug-Related Deaths by Sex (USA, 1990–2019)
charts.description: Trend of drug-attributable deaths over time, grouped by sex. Filter to USA and years 1990–2019; aggregated across all ages.

charts.title: Drug-Related Deaths by Age Group and Sex (USA, 1990–2019)
charts.description: Total drug-attributable deaths aggregated over 1990–2019 by age group and sex. Filter to USA; sort bars by total to highlight highest-burden age groups.
